# Necrotic Empowerment (Spell)
## Overview
[[Necromancy Spells|Necromancy]] \[[[Evil Spells|evil]]]

**Level:** [[8th Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 8]], [[8th Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 8]], [[8th Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 8]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 15th-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 15]], [[BoXM 15th-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 15]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S, F

**Range:** Personal

**Target:** You

**Duration:** 1 round/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Libris Mortis (WotC), pg. 68

You call upon the mother cyst that your body hosts, drawing from it strength, vigor, speed, and vicious certainty. 

While the spell is in effect, you gain a +8 enhancement bonus to Dexterity, Intelligence, and Wisdom, a +8 natural armor bonus to Armor Class as your skin briefly crusts and hardens, a +5 competence bonus on Fortitude saves, and 100 temporary hit points.

While the empowerment lasts, you are unable to cast any other mother cyst feat-enabled spell.

*Focus:* Caster must possess a mother cyst (*Libris Mortis* 28).
